heroSectionOne.title: Keep track of your
heroSectionOne.desc: Dinexa helps you keep track of every expense you make or profit you earn. Stay in control of your money with ease

benefitsOne.title: Track, Analyze, and Boost Your Wealth
benefitsOne.subTitle: Track expenses, customize categories, and grow your wealth with ease.

data.DailySpendLogDesc: With our free plan, you can easily track your daily expenses and categorize them for better organization.
data.SpendCategorizationDesc: You can create and customize categories for your expenses, allowing you to easily see where your money is going
data.DailySavingTipsDesc: Save your money with the best saving tips
data.SpendMetricsDesc: Track and analyze financial metrics to boost wealth and achieve financial goals.
